style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Our plan was developed to support a two- to three-year equity plan duration to ensure we obtain frequent shareholder input on our share usage</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Fungible Share Pool</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Uses a fungible share pool model in which each full value award (i.e., awards other than stock options (Options) and stock appreciation rights (SARs)) counts as 1.55 share against the Plan reserve</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Minimum Exercise Price</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Requires that Options and SARs must have an exercise price of no less than fair market value</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Repricing or Buyouts of Underwater Awards</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Option and SAR repricing is prohibited without explicit shareholder approval</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Evergreen Feature</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Does not contain any evergreen features which would automatically provide for an increase in the shares available for grant</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Reload Options or Loans to Purchase Shares</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Does not permit the use of reloads or Company loans to exercise or purchase shares under the Plan</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Liberal Share Recycling of Awards</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Does not permit liberal share recycling of awards. In particular, the following shares may not be used again for new awards: any shares withheld to pay the exercise price or purchase price of an award; any shares withheld to satisfy a tax withholding obligation in connection with an award; any shares not issued as a result of the net settlement of an award; or any shares we repurchase using Option exercise proceeds</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Liberal Change in Control Definition</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Change in control benefits are triggered only by the occurrence, rather than by the shareholder approval, of a merger or other change in control event</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Automatic Single Trigger Acceleration on Change in Control</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">If awards are assumed by a successor company in connection with a change in control, such awards will not automatically vest and pay out solely as a result of the change in control</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Excise Tax Gross-ups</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">The Plan does not provide for future tax gross-ups</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Limit on Non-Employee Director Awards</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">The Plan establishes a reasonable compensation limit that may be granted or paid to a non-employee director in any fiscal year</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Awards Subject to Clawback Policy</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Awards granted under the Plan are subject to our clawback policy</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Minimum Vesting Requirements</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">If the amendment is approved, the Plan provides that equity awards will be subject to an initial vesting period of no less than 12 months from the date of grant (subject to certain exceptions as described below)</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Chief Executive Officer Stock Ownership Guidelines</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">The Chief Executive Officer is subject to stock ownership requirements, as discussed above under &#8220;Compensation Discussion and Analysis &#8211; Compensation Risk Assessment and Mitigation and Additional Compensation Practices &#8211; Chief Executive Officer Stock Ownership Guidelines&#8221;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No Dividends or Dividend Equivalents on Unvested Awards</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Does not permit dividends or dividend equivalents to be paid to unvested Awards</font></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">52</font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div></div><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:left;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Background for Requested Share Increase</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">In determining the number of shares to reserve for issuance under the Plan, our Compensation Committee considered a number of factors, including:</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Our Current Reserve of Shares Will Be Depleted Following Our 2019 Annual Grants</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">As of </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">April&#160;5, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">, only </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">2,221,194</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;shares of our common stock remained available for future grants and awards under the Plan, an amount that the Board believes to be insufficient to meet Cray&#8217;s anticipated needs beyond the upcoming 2019 annual grants. Therefore, the Board has unanimously adopted, subject to shareholder approval, the amendment and restatement of our Plan to increase the maximum number of shares of our common stock that may be issued under the Plan by </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">1,500,000</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;shares, or 3.6% of our common shares outstanding, to ensure that Cray will continue to have available a reasonable number of shares for use pursuant to its equity incentive program.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Our Burn Rate Levels Are Expected to Be Consistent</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Burn rate measures our usage of shares for our equity plans as a percentage of our outstanding stock. For 2018, 2017, and 2016, our burn rate was 2.5%, 4.1%, and 1.5%, respectively. The rates were calculated by dividing the aggregate number of shares subject to options, restricted stock awards, and restricted stock units granted during the fiscal year by the weighted average number of shares outstanding during the fiscal year.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">The Resulting Pool of Shares Will Be Reasonable</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">As of </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">April&#160;5, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">, stock options to purchase </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">1,689,651</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;shares (with a weighted average price of $20.55 and remaining term of 5.7 years), </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">33,269</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;restricted stock awards, </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">1,209,357</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;restricted stock units, and </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">482,485</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;performance vesting restricted stock units (</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;font-weight:bold;">PVRSUs</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">) (assuming that the maximum number of eligible PVRSUs vest) were outstanding under all of our equity plans and we had 377 participants in the Plan as of </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">April&#160;5, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">. Accordingly, our approximately </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">3,414,762</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;outstanding awards (awards commonly referred to as the &#8220;overhang&#8221;) plus approximately </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">2,221,194</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;shares available under the Plan, each as of </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">April&#160;5, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">, plus the </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">1,500,000</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;shares proposed to be available for future grant under our Plan represent approximately </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">17.4%</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;of our outstanding shares. Based on this analysis, the Compensation Committee concluded that the total overhang percentage would not result in excessive overhang for shareholders. As of </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">April&#160;5, 2019</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">, there were </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">41,096,468</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;shares of our common stock outstanding.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:left;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Summary of Shareholder Protective Plan Amendments</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Vesting Restriction</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan includes a restriction that no portion of any award will vest prior to the first anniversary of the date of grant of the Award; provided, that the Compensation Committee may accelerate vesting on a discretionary basis. For purposes of awards to non-employee directors, a vesting period will be deemed to be one year if it runs from the date of one annual meeting of the Company&#8217;s shareholders to the next annual meeting of the Company&#8217;s shareholders provided that such annual meetings are at least 50&#160;weeks apart. This restriction on vesting will generally apply to all awards, however, this restriction will not apply for up to 5% of the shares reserved under the Plan.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Dividend and Dividend Equivalent Restriction for Unvested Awards</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan provides that any dividends or dividend equivalent rights will be subject to the same vesting and/or performance conditions as apply to the underlying award, and will not be paid until and when the underlying award becomes vested. In addition, Options and SARs will be ineligible for dividend equivalent rights.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Shares Withheld to Satisfy Taxes May Not Return to Plan</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Currently, the Plan provides that the following shares may not return to the Plan to be used again for new awards: shares withheld to pay the exercise price or purchase price of an award; any shares withheld to satisfy a tax withholding obligation in connection with an Option or SAR; any shares not issued as a result of the net settlement of an Option or SAR; or any shares we repurchase using Option exercise proceeds. The proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan expands this provision to provide that shares may not return to the Plan to be used again for new awards if shares are withheld to satisfy a tax withholding obligation in connection with any award or if shares are not issued as a result of the net settlement of any award.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Limit on Non-Employee Director Compensation</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Currently, a non-employee director may receive equity awards representing no more than 150,000 shares in a calendar year. If the proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan is approved, this limit will be changed to provide that a non-employee director may receive compensation (including cash and equity awards) representing no more than $500,000 total value in any calendar year; provided that a newly appointed non-employee director may receive compensation (including cash and equity awards) representing no more than $1,000,000 for the calendar year of his or her appointment.</font></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">53</font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div></div><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Clarifying and Technical Changes</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan also includes certain technical changes for enhanced clarity, but that do not change the substance or meaning of the terms and provisions of the Plan. Additionally, in light of the changes to Section&#160;162(m) of the IRC under the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017, we have removed certain provisions that were previously included for tax deductibility purposes under Section 162(m) of the IRC and are no longer relevant.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:left;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Summary of the Plan</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The complete text of the Plan is attached to this Proxy Statement as </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;text-decoration:underline;">Appendix A</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">. The following is a summary of the key provisions of the Plan as proposed to be amended and is qualified in its entirety by reference to </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;text-decoration:underline;">Appendix&#160;A</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:16%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td><td style="width:82%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#ffffff;">Key Provisions</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#ffffff;">Summary</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Plan Term:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">From March&#160;26, 2013, the date the Plan was approved by our Board (Effective Date), to March&#160;26, 2023.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">&#160;</font></div></td><td colspan="2" style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Eligible Participants:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Only employees, including officers and directors who are also employees, are eligible to receive grants of incentive stock options. All other awards may be granted to any of our employees, directors, consultants, and independent contractors, provided that the grantee renders bona fide services to us. Our Compensation Committee determines which individuals will participate in the Plan. Currently, pursuant to the terms of the Plan, there are approximately 1,300 employees and eight non-employee directors who are eligible to participate in the Plan.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Shares Authorized:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">There are currently (and without giving effect to the proposed amendment to increase the share reserve) 6,000,000 shares of common stock authorized under the Plan, plus shares that were reserved, but not issued or not subject to outstanding grants under our 2009 Amended and Restated Long-Term Equity Compensation Plan, our 2006 Long-Term Incentive Plan, our 2004 Long-Term Incentive Plan, and our 2003 Stock Option Plan (collectively, the Prior Plans) on the Effective Date, and which were added to the Plan on the Effective Date pursuant to a &#8220;pour over&#8221; provision, plus (i) shares that are subject to Options or other awards granted under the Prior Plans that cease to be subject to awards by forfeiture or otherwise after the Effective Date for any reason; (ii) shares issued under the Prior Plans before or after the Effective Date pursuant to the exercise of Options or SARs that are, after the Effective Date, forfeited; (iii) shares issued under the Prior Plans that are repurchased by us at the original issue price; and (iv) shares that are subject to Options or other awards granted under the Prior Plans that otherwise terminate without shares of our common stock being issued, in each case, regardless of the type of award that could be issued with respect to such shares under the Prior Plans.</font></div><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;</font></div><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">In addition, shares subject to awards, and shares issued under the Plan under any award, will again be available for grant and issuance under the Plan to the extent such shares: (i) are subject to issuance upon exercise of an Option or SAR granted under the Plan but which cease to be subject to the Option or SAR for any reason other than exercise of the Option or SAR; (ii) are subject to awards granted under the Plan that are forfeited or are repurchased by us at the original issue price; (iii) are subject to awards granted under the Plan that otherwise terminate without such shares being issued; or (iv) are surrendered pursuant to an exchange program approved by our shareholders as required by the Plan.</font></div><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;</font></div><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">The following shares may not be used again for new awards: (i) any shares withheld to pay the exercise price or purchase price for any awards; (ii) any shares withheld to satisfy a tax withholding obligation in connection with an award; (iii) any shares not issued as a result of the net settlement of an award; or (iv) any shares we repurchase using Option exercise proceeds.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div units</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Full-Value Share Multiple for Determining the Number of Shares Available for Grant:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">For purposes of determining the number of shares available for grant under the Plan against the maximum number of shares authorized, any full-value award (i.e., anything other than an Option or a SAR) reduces the number of shares available for issuance under the Plan by 1.55 shares.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">No more than one million (1,000,000) shares may be granted to any individual under the Plan during any calendar year, other than new employees, who are eligible to receive up to two million (2,000,000) shares in the calendar year during which they begin employment.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">54</font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div></div><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:center;font-size:10pt;"><div style="padding-left:0px;text-indent:0px;line-height:normal;padding-top:10px;"><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;width:100%;border-collapse:collapse;text-align:left;"><tr><td colspan="3"></td></tr><tr><td style="width:16%;"></td><td style="width:2%;"></td><td style="width:82%;"></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#ffffff;">Key Provisions</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;background-color:#26cad3;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#ffffff;">Summary</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Award Terms:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Options have a term no longer than 10 years from the date the Options were granted, except in the case of incentive Options granted to holders of more than 10% of our voting power, which have a term no longer than five years. Stock appreciation rights have a term no longer than 10&#160;years from the date they were granted.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Grants to Non-Employee Directors:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Currently, when a non-employee director joins the Board, he or she receives an initial grant of fully vested options to purchase 20,000 shares of common stock. Additionally, at the 2019 Annual Meeting, each continuing non-employee director elected by the shareholders receives a grant of restricted shares of common stock with a value equal to $140,000. The restricted shares vest in full upon the earlier of the one year from the date of grant or the date that is immediately prior to the date of our next annual shareholders&#8217; meeting. In addition, if the proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan is approved, the Plan will provide that a non-employee director may receive compensation (including cash and equity awards) representing no more than $500,000 total value in any calendar year; provided that a newly appointed non-employee director may receive compensation (including cash and equity awards) representing no more than $1,000,000 for the calendar year of his or her appointment.</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:bottom;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="overflow:hidden;height:5px;font-size:10pt;"><font style="font-family:inherit;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</font></div></td></tr><tr><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;font-style:italic;">Repricing Prohibited:</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:left;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">&#160;&#160;</font></div></td><td style="vertical-align:top;padding-left:2px;padding-top:2px;padding-bottom:2px;padding-right:2px;"><div style="text-align:justify;font-size:9pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9pt;color:#5e514d;">Repricing, or reducing the exercise price of outstanding Options or SARs, is prohibited without shareholder approval under the Plan. Such prohibited repricing includes canceling, substituting, or exchanging outstanding Options or SARs in exchange for cash, other awards or Options or SARs with an exercise price that is less than the exercise price of the original Options or SARs, unless approved by shareholders.</font></div></td></tr></table></div></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:left;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Terms Applicable to Stock Options and Stock Appreciation Rights</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The exercise price of grants made under the Plan of Options or SARs may not be less than the fair market value which is the closing price of our common stock as reported by Nasdaq on the trading day immediately prior to the date of grant.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">On the record date, the closing price of our common stock as reported by Nasdaq was </font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">$26.86</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">&#32;per share. The term of these awards may not be longer than 10 years. Our Compensation Committee determines at the time of grant the other terms and conditions applicable to such award, including vesting and exercisability.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Terms Applicable to Restricted Stock Awards, Restricted Stock Units, Performance Vesting Restricted Stock Awards, Performance Vesting Restricted Stock Units and Stock Bonus Awards</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Our Compensation Committee determines the terms and conditions applicable to the granting of restricted stock awards, restricted stock units, performance vesting restricted stock awards, performance vesting restricted stock units, and stock bonus awards. Our Compensation Committee may make the grant, issuance, retention and/or vesting of restricted stock awards, restricted stock units, performance vesting restricted stock awards, performance restricted stock units, and stock bonus awards contingent upon continued employment with us, the passage of time, or such performance criteria and the level of achievement versus such criteria as it deems appropriate. Awards of performance vesting restricted stock or performance vesting restricted stock units may be settled in shares or in cash.</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:left;text-indent:24px;font-size:11pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:11pt;color:#5e514d;font-weight:bold;">Performance Factors</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-bottom:4px;padding-top:4px;text-align:justify;padding-left:0px;text-indent:24px;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">To the extent that awards are intended to be performance-based awards, the performance criteria may include among other criteria, one of the following criteria, either individually, alternatively or in any combination, applied to either Cray as a whole or to a business unit or subsidiary, either individually, alternatively, or in any combination, and measured either annually or cumulatively over a period of years, on an absolute basis or relative to a pre-established target, to previous years&#8217; results or to a designated comparison group, in each case as specified by our Compensation Committee in the award:</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Profit before tax;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Billings;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Revenue;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Net revenue;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Earnings (which may include earnings before interest and taxes, earnings before taxes, and net earnings);</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Operating income;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Operating margin;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Operating profit;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Controllable operating profit, or net operating profit;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Net profit;</font></div><div><br></div><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:center;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">55</font></div></div><hr style="page-break-after:always"><div><div style="line-height:120%;text-align:justify;font-size:9.5pt;"><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;"><br></font></div></div><div><br></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Gross margin;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Operating expenses or operating expenses as a percentage of revenue;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Net income;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Earnings per share;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Total shareholder return;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font share;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font assets or net assets;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">The Company&#8217;s stock price;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Growth in shareholder value relative to a pre-determined index;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Return on equity;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Return on invested capital;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font style="padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;padding-right:14px;">&#8226;</font><font style="font-family:Arial;font-size:9.5pt;color:#5e514d;">Cash flow (including free cash flow or operating cash flows);</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font conversion cycle;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font value added;</font></div><div style="line-height:120%;padding-left:33px;padding-bottom:4px;text-align:justify;text-indent:0px;"><font
